tier.item: And the Kyng has comandyd my Lord Rewars ... to go to the Towyr ...
and as or hors, my Loorde Reuerys sendys dayly abhowte to inqweyr for 0.

tier.item: Syr, as ffor all yowre thynggys here doyth well, but as ffor the wull fflete
off London, ys nott common yett.
'Sir, as for all your things here do well, but as for the wool
fleet from London, has not yet arrived.'

off London, ys nott common yett.
